description: Aussie goldenboy Sean Davis is used to working in the scorching sun but when it becomes unbearable and overwhelming, he stops for a well-needed break. He imagines himself relaxing poolside with a hunky mate like Alex Kincaid, both of them clad in matching speedos and focused on nothing but the carnal pleasures they can bestow each other. They kiss and suck cock before Sean starts to rim Alex's tight asshole, prepping it for the intense fucking he's got in store. And boy, does he deliver!
title: Summer Fever, Scene #02
